title: Riot Christmas Event

replies.body:
Riot **is not** doing a *free RP event*, so you're lucky to not have clicked those links.

Keep up the good security practices, fam! ^.^
Excuse me but this link (www.riotchristmas.net) seems harmless.Like Gamekit.Can you help me understand what is this thing?
It even says that it's a secure website

Nowadays it won't matter if your browser says it is a secure website, with people able to get free certificates for their domain with LetsEncrypt. Even then a certificate will only encrypt a connection to a certain host, if that host is malicious it won't matter if it is secure, the host on the other side can just store data at their side and potentially do stuff with the data they receive.
I personally tried it and i ended up getting 3500 RP, it is not a scam and i would recommend that everyone tries it.
I promise you that Riot is not currently giving away free RP, do _not_ fall for it. Your account will be comprised otherwise.
